00021 #ifndef _CELFileConvertToCalvin_HEADER_
00022 #define _CELFileConvertToCalvin_HEADER_
00023 
00024 /*! file CELFileConvertToCalvin.h This file contains a class to convert a CEL file to Calvin format. */
00025 
00026 #include "calvin_files/converters/cel/src/CELFileConversionOptions.h"
00027 #include "calvin_files/converters/cel/src/CELFileConverterErrorCode.h"
00028 #include "calvin_files/data/src/CELData.h"
00029 //
00030 #include "file/CELFileData.h"
00031 //
00032 
00033 namespace affymetrix_cel_converter
00034 {
00035 
00036 /*! This class will convert a CEL file to Calvin format. */
00037 class CELFileConvertToCalvin
00038 {
00039 public:
00040 
00041         /*! Constructor */
00042         CELFileConvertToCalvin();
00043 
00044         /*! Destructor */
00045         ~CELFileConvertToCalvin();
00046 
00047         /*! Set the physical array id.
00048          *      @param str The physical array id.
00049          */
00050         void SetArrayID(const char *str) { arrayID = str; }
00051 
00052         /*! Set the array barcode.
00053          *      @param str The array barcode.
00054          */
00055         void SetArrayBarcode(const wchar_t *str) { arrayBarcode = str; }
00056 
00057         /*! The full path and name of the parent file.
00058          *      @param str The full path and name of the parent file.
00059          */
00060         void SetParentFileName(const char* str) { parentFileName = str; }
00061 
00062         /*! Set extra parameters that are to be written to the file.
00063          *      @param params A collection of ParameterNameValueTypes to add to the file.
00064          */
00065         void SetExtraParameters(const affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueTypeVector* params) { extraParameters = params; }
00066 
00067         /*! Gets the error code for the conversion process.
00068          * @return The error code associated with the last failure.
00069          */
00070         CELFileConverterErrorCode ErrorCode() const { return errorCode; }
00071 
00072         /*! Convert the file to Calvin format.
00073          * @param fileName The full path name of the CEL file.
00074          * @param newFile The name of the new CEL file.
00075          * @return True if successful.
00076          */
00077         bool ConvertASCIIFile(const char *fileName, const char *newFile, CELFileConversionOptions *options = NULL);
00078 
00079         /*! Convert the file to Calvin format.
00080          * @param fileName The full path name of the CEL file.
00081          * @param newFile The name of the new CEL file.
00082          * @return True if successful.
00083          */
00084         bool ConvertXDAFile(const char *fileName, const char *newFile, CELFileConversionOptions *options = NULL, const char* datFileName = NULL );
00085 
00086 protected:
00087 
00088         /*! Fills the GenericDataHeader with the parent file header which it gets either from the parent file
00089          *      or generates based on the GCOS CEL file.
00090          *      @param hdr The GenericDataHeader that will be filled with the parent file header information.
00091          *      @param inFile The GCOS CEL file.
00092          */
00093         bool FillParentGenericDataHeader(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader& hdr, affxcel::CCELFileData& inFile);
00094 
00095         /*! Gets the GenericDataHeader from the parent Command Console file.
00096          *      The arrayID member is ignored.
00097          *      @param hdr The GenericDataHeader that will be filled with the parent file information.
00098          *      @return True if the parent file GenericDataHeader information was found.
00099          */
00100         bool GetParentGenericDataHeader(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader& hdr);
00101 
00102         /*! Generates a parent GenericDataHeader based on the GCOS CEL file.
00103          *      If the arrayID member is set, it will be added to the parent header.
00104          *      @param hdr The GenericDataHeader that will be filled with the parent information.
00105          */
00106         bool GenerateParentGenericDataHeaderFromGCOS(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader& hdr, affxcel::CCELFileData& inFile);
00107 
00108         /*! Adds any extra parameters from the extraParameter collection to the file header.
00109          *      @param data The target CelFileData.
00110          */
00111         void AddExtraParameters(affymetrix_calvin_io::CelFileData& data);
00112 
00113         /*! Gets the scanner type from the extra parameters.
00114          *      @return Scanner type
00115          */
00116         std::wstring GetScannerTypeFromExtraParameters();
00117 
00118 private:
00119 
00120         /*! The physical array ID. */
00121         std::string arrayID;
00122 
00123         /*! The array barcode */
00124         std::wstring arrayBarcode;
00125 
00126         /*! The parent file name. */
00127         std::string parentFileName;
00128 
00129         /*! Extra parameters. Lifetime is not managed by this class. */
00130         const affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueTypeVector* extraParameters;
00131 
00132         /*! The error code. */
00133         CELFileConverterErrorCode errorCode;
00134 
00135         /*! Clear the class members. */
00136         void Clear();
00137 
00138     /*! Options for conversion. */
00139     CELFileConversionOptions *m_Options;
00140 
00141 };
00142 
00143 }
